price: And [remember] when We parted the sea for you and saved you, while We drowned the people of Pharaoh while you were looking on.
arabic: وَإِذۡ فَرَقۡنَا بِكُمُ ٱلۡبَحۡرَ فَأَنجَيۡنَٰكُمۡ وَأَغۡرَقۡنَآ ءَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَأَنتُمۡ تَنظُرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
